name: hermod
description: Hermod is a high-performance, messaging system designed with SOLID principles and zero-allocation in mind.

scripts.ui:build: cd ui && bun run build && cd .. && powershell -Command "Copy-Item -Recurse -Force ui/dist/* internal/api/static/"
